arts.sum: Kilmarnock FC today confirmed the signing of goalkeeper Tobi Oluwayemi on an emergency seven-day loan from Celtic, while Daizen Maeda has been ruled out of Celtic’s Europa League match against SK Sturm Graz… The 22-year-old London-born shot-stopper came through the youth systems at Tottenham Hotspur before joining Celtic. arts.ttl: “Celtic stronger than Rangers” – Sturm Graz player explains what he’s thinking
arts.sum: Rangers lost 2-1 to Sturm Graz at the beginning of October. Another lost match in a miserable period for the Ibrox club. After the Austrian club went ahead in the Europa League tie, Djeidi Gassama scored an equaliser but Rangers ultimately lost. Celtic now welcome Sturm Graz and there’s obviously. arts.ttl: Celtic ‘dream’ revealed by Sturm Graz player – Sounds a bit too much of a Celtic fan
arts.sum: Sturm Graz’s Emir Karić says he was thrilled when he found about facing Celtic in the Europa League. Brendan Rodgers’ side host the Austrian club at Celtic Park this week, and this fixture has got the 28-year-old excited. Ahead of the Celtic clash, Wednesday’s edition of Kleine Zeitung has an interview with Karić.
